Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.SpriteSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SpriteSheet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A set of sprites that a character can have
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.Image face

      private java.lang.String sheet_path
      The path to the sprite sheet
      private java.awt.Image[][] sprites

      The standing position of all the sprite images
